dcterms:description: The AMI meeting corpus consists of recordings of meetings that include multiple speakers, enabling research in speaker diarization and identification.
dcterms:title: AMI Corpus

dcterms:description: The DIHARD challenges provide datasets for evaluating speaker diarization systems, focusing on challenging conditions such as overlapping speech.

dcterms:description: VoxCeleb 1 and 2 are large-scale speaker recognition datasets that contain thousands of speakers and are used for training and evaluating speaker identification systems.
dcterms:title: VoxCeleb 1 and 2
